segments.text: I see the wide-open cabinet doors, framing the boy as he reaches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a snapshot of childhood innocence, yet there’s something unsettling about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn’t look stable at all, and I can feel my stomach drop at the thought of him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation adds to the tension; she’s so hopeful for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just look up for a second, but she’s lost in her dishwashing routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a scene of mischief, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the tidy garden outside and the chaos inside is almost jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR
